message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it's quite valuable and will be useful to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm trying to stay within a tight budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $80 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still trying to stay within my budget. How about we meet at $90? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
